name: mw4-morning
description:
1/1
2021.
4950x4950 px

In spite of all of the wonderful art that’s being made with AI, GAN etc, I still think there’s room in digital art for humans to explore the human condition and how context and mood have an impact on us.

mw4 and 5 both stem from the previous piece. Both concern themselves with ‘growth’ out of what went before.

So in the middle of coffee and emails and Twitter and Instagram and coffee and those lovely ‘likes’ and coffee and the news and wondering if it’s going to rain and back ache and coffee I grew ‘mw4 - morning’ out of its predecessor. 

Guess what I did before going to sleep that same night? ‘mw5 - evening’ still had the same artwork as its source, but this time the lamps were lit and the blinds were down and the film had finished and we were tired but I started again. 

Both were attempts to make an individual piece of art.

I won’t be able to do this again as I’ll unconsciously know what I’m looking for.
